name: Harvest Them
summary: You are the sole necromancer living in the surrounding forest of a small village. You have remained dormant for many years but your hunger has awakened you and you must feed on the souls of the living. You gather souls within your Wellheart and must not let it be destroyed. The surrounding area is filled with monsters that come out at night. They will be drawn towards your Wellheart, and attempt to destroy it. Villagers hide at night and move about during the day. The village lies to the south east of your Wellheart. There are four monster dens around the forest. Defend your Wellheart at night and feed during the day.
